level.heading: REQUIREMENT FOR REFILING OF AN APPLICATION (§ 24-1407)

level.text: If the Council has not acted on the application during the time period set forth in §1401.14 or if the Director has not forwarded the application to the Council during the time period set forth in §1401.14, the applicant may be required to file, pursuant to this chapter, a new application to close a street or alley.

Except as provided pursuant to §1401.9, an applicant may be required to file, pursuant to this chapter, a new application to close a street or alley when the applicant has failed to respond to the notification of objections or conditions pursuant to § 1401.8 within ninety (90) days.
